amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt rules relating to the enforcement of the Clean Air Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 115-20 to exempt rules relating to the enforcement of the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 110).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 110).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Raskin.
